name: Single Sided Balancer
description: Supplies {{token}} to a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) to earn BAL and trading fees. Rewards are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Single Sided Balancer
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) to earn BAL and trading fees. Rewards are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Single Sided Balancer
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur Une pool stable sur [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) pour gagner des BAL et des frais de négociation. Les récompenses sont récoltées, vendues pour plus de {{token}} et redéposées dans la stratégie.

es.name: Single Sided Balancer
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a un grupo estable en [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) para ganar BAL y tarifas comerciales. Las recompensas se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} y se vuelven a depositar en la estrategia.

de.description: Supplies {{token}} to a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) to earn BAL and trading fees. Rewards are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Single Sided Balancer
tr.description: BAL ve işlem ücretleri kazanmak için [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) üzerindeki bir Stabil Havuza {{token}} sağlar. Ödüller toplanır, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve stratejiye geri yatırılır.

vi.name: Single Sided Balancer
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) to earn BAL and trading fees. Rewards are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Single Sided Balancer
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) 的稳定池以赚取 BAL 代币奖励和交易手续费。收获奖励后，卖掉，换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Single Sided Balancer
hi.description: BAL और ट्रेडिंग शुल्क अर्जित करने के लिए [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) पर एक स्थिर पूल में {{token}} की आपूर्ति करता है। पुरस्कारों को काटा जाता है, अधिक {{token}} में बेचा जाता है, और वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
